title: Tsutte Tabetai Gal Sawa-San
alternative_title: Tsutte Tabetai Gyaru Sawa-san ; Gal Sawa-san Wants to Fish and Eat ; Gal Sawa-san Who Wants To Fish And Eat ; 釣って食べたいギャル澤さん
status: Tsutte Tabetai Gyaru Sawa-san ; Gal Sawa-san Wants to Fish and Eat ; Gal Sawa-san Who Wants To Fish And Eat ; 釣って食べたいギャル澤さん
description:
Description :
        The only hobby Tsuruya-kun has after being a working adult for 3 years is weekend sea fishing. He was quietly fishing alone in the open sea, healing the stress of his daily life by casting a fishing line.
But that's when a loud gal appeared out of nowhere. Tsuruya-kun's peaceful fishing life is sure to be thrown into turmoil!!
A gourmet comedy about fishing with Reiwa gals is about to set sail!!
